title: Rick and Morty: That's Amorte (Season 07, Episode 04), OR An Artificial Burden Of Cognizance
description: I think it's fair to say that we're constantly learning a lot and nothing at all.
author: Washington Irving
synopsis: This one's a real a-spicy meatball!

media.alt: Rick eating a bowl of spaghetti.

title: South Park: The Breast Cancer Show Ever (Season 12 Episode 9), OR What's Inexplicably Beautiful About the Attachment to the Self
description: The story isn't always about you, but when it is make it count.
author: Washington Irving
synopsis: Principal Veronica is a breast cancer survivor.

media.alt: Rick eating a bowl of spaghetti.

title: The Devil's Hands are Idle Playthings
description: Destiny has cheated me. Maybe it's cheated all of us.
author: Washington Irving
synopsis: Fry makes a deal with the robot devil, at a cost he only later comes to understand.

media.alt: Rick eating a bowl of spaghetti.
